channel.title: Ramblings on ayulin.net

item.title: Designing 4-bit Webther: A Retrospective
item.description: Update (2020-04-19): 4-bit Webther is no longer available; the Yahoo! Weather API is no more. The links to it here have been removed, but the remainder of the post’s text has been left untouched, as self-indulgent as it is.
